body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth        Kids enjoy leaving their own "inscriptions" the only place at El Morro where it's o.k. to—on the rocks in front of the visitor center. NPS Photo        Back at the visitor center, kids will find lots of books and other neat stuff in the "kid's corner". NPS photo       Are you interested in becoming a Junior Ranger?  Click here to see what you need to do!      Meet The Rangers  Get to know what rangers do on a daily basis in the national parks! Click here to learn more!
title: El Morro National Monument: Kids & Youth
